a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Diarrheal disease deaths in children under five by risk factor, World
Estimated annual number of diarrheal disease deaths attributed to each risk factor, in children under five.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Risk factors are not mutually exclusive. The sum of deaths attributed to each risk factor can exceed the total number of deaths.
